children.value: (This is not the building I am looking for...)
(Kuya Jay told me it has a flight of stairs outside...)
Welcome to De La Salle University!
I am Kuya Jared! A Lasallian Ambassador under the SLIFE! Ready to serve!
I bet it's your first day! Maybe you will need some school supplies.
There is a National Bookstore located at the first floor of the Yuchengco building.
Walk to the right then go up. It has a flight of stairs outside the building.
Another LAmb is situated there. She will guide you to the store.
Enjoy your day, and Animo La Salle!
Go approach the LAmb situated near the Yuchengco building to the far right!
Enjoy! Animo La Salle!
Welcome to the Amphitheater!
You might have already seen this place but trust me you wouldn't get tired of this view.
This the best place to chat with your friends during free time!
When it's not raining, that is.
Oh look who's at the Amphitheater now!
It's Brother Koopa! One of our beloved De La Salle Brothers!
Why don't you go and talk to him?
He loves meeting frosh.
Why don't you talk to Brother Koopa?
It'll really brighten up his day!
Look at the time! It's almost lunch.
Come with me, I know a place.
Oh hello there.
Good morning to you as well.
I was just admiring the happy new faces that surround our campus once again.
St. John Baptist de La Salle really had a vision.
We hope that you would embody our three core values.
Faith, Service, Communion.
Remember these three and you will never be lost.
I love FSC!
Don't you?
